BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE drtia_application_form_dtl SET GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?, NUM_MODE_OF_ID=?,str_email_identification_no=?,str_letter_number=?, str_letter_cid_number=?,str_file_name=?,str_file_cid_number=?,dt_request_date=?,str_request_time=?,str_pio_from_inform_required=?,str_contact_name=?,STR_HOUSE_NO=?,STR_STREET_NAME=?,STR_CITY_NAME=?,STR_STATE=?,STR_PIN=?,str_contact_tel_no=?,str_contact_e_mail=?,str_citizen_of_india=?,str_nature_a=?,str_type_copy_document=?,str_type_inspection_records=?,str_type_sample_material=?,str_type_other_information=?,str_info_sought_third_party=?,str_if_yes_trd_party_nm_add=?,str_part_info_required=?,num_tm_prd_info_required=?,str_app_blng_to_bpl_cat=?,str_proof_of_bpl_attached=?,num_fee_paid_amount=?,str_fee_paid_dtl_remarks=?,str_mode_of_payment=?,dt_fee_receiving_date=?,str_remarks=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SLNO_MODE_OF_ID=?,NUM_FLAG_ID=?,STR_INSTRUMENT_NAME=?,STR_INSTRUMENT_NO=?,DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE=? ,STR_UPLOAD_FILE_NAME=? WHERE STR_APPLICATION_REQUEST_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE drtia_application_form_dtl SET GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE STR_APPLICATION_REQUEST_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
